content: कल्क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कल्-क <ls>Uṇ. 3. 40</ls>] Sinful, wicked. --ल्कः, --ल्कं {@--1@} The viscous sediment deposited by oily substances when ground. {@--2@} A kind of tenacious paste; <ls>Y. 1. 277.</ls> {@--3@} (Hence) Dirt, filth (in general). {@--4@} Ordure, fæces. {@--5@} Meanness, deceit, hypocrisy; <ls>Śi. 19. 98.</ls> {@--6@} Sin. {@--7@} Levigated powder; तां लोध्रकल्केन हृतांगतैलां <ls>Ku. 7. 9.</ls> {@--8@} Incense. {@--9@} The wax of the ear.
